MOBILEORIGINALTAG_SEARCH_WHERE.Statement: WHERE w2_MobileOriginalTag.dept_id = @dept_id AND ( (@orgtag_id_like_escaped = '' OR w2_MobileOriginalTag.orgtag_id LIKE @orgtag_id_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') -- オリジナルタグID AND (@orgtag_name_like_escaped = '' OR w2_MobileOriginalTag.orgtag_name LIKE '%' + @orgtag_name_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') -- 表示名 )

MOBILEORIGINALTAG_SEARCH_ORDER_BY.Statement: ORDER BY CASE @sort_kbn WHEN 0 THEN w2_MobileOriginalTag.orgtag_id WHEN 2 THEN w2_MobileOriginalTag.orgtag_name ELSE '1' END ASC, CASE @sort_kbn WHEN 1 THEN w2_MobileOriginalTag.orgtag_id WHEN 3 THEN w2_MobileOriginalTag.orgtag_name ELSE '1' END DESC, -- 常に一定の結果セットを得るため、主キー（昇順）ソート w2_MobileOriginalTag.dept_id ASC, w2_MobileOriginalTag.orgtag_id ASC
